string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: The most common eye color is blue.
The angles of a triangle add up to 360.
The sun will fall out of the sky in 3 years.
The questions of this exam are designed to be easy.
This exam is designed to demonstrate the importance of UX.
Contributing to Open Source projects is a way to build rapport and skill.
AI has completely taken over my university and homework now comes with a CAPTCHA.
AI has, without exaggeration, fully conquered every video and board game.
